messages.content: Hello! How can I help you today?

Next.js 13 introduces many new features and improvements, including:

1.   React Hooks Support: Next.js 13 supports React Hooks, which allows you to use state management and other React library features in your pages and components.
2.   Improved Performance: Next.js 13 has improved performance and faster rendering times compared to previous versions.
3.   Refined UX: Next.js 13 has a refined UX with updated icons, typography, and other design elements.
4.   Enhanced Component API: Next.js 13 has a more flexible and powerful component API, allowing for easier development and customization.
5.   Improved Middleware Integration: Next.js 13 has improved integration with middleware and serverless functions.
6.   Enhanced Support for Styling: Next.js 13 has enhanced support for styling, including improved support for CSS-in-JS and the ability to use inline CSS.
7.   Enhanced Support for Deployment: Next.js 13 has improved support for deployment, including the ability to deploy pages and components to more platforms, such as Azure and AWS.
